alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 8:34PM CST until November 20 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Northern Vermilion Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 833 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wright, or near Gueydan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Kaplan, Gueydan, Meaux, Wright, Lyons Point, Indian Bayou, and Florence Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Small hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
